quotes.quote: Hiding what you know is sometimes as important as knowing it.
We each have our hiding places and we each put up with the little quirks of the people we love.
Talking much about oneself may be a way of hiding oneself.
All your personalities are absolute cover-ups, hiding your individuality.
The power of hiding ourselves from one another is mercifully given, for men are wild beasts, and would devour one another but for this protection.
All the secrets of the world worth knowing are hiding in plain site.
Inside everybody's hiding something.
When you're hiding behind a character all the time, as soon as you have to be yourself, you feel kind of terrified.
Writing always means hiding something in such a way that it then is discovered.
Hiding spending does not reduce spending.
No one is going to be powerful in their ministry if they are hiding something that they are afraid people will find out at any moment.
Hiding places there are innumerable, escape is only one, but possibilities of escape, again, are as many as hiding places.
If you keep hiding your true self, your life becomes like slow death. Once you become free from the lies and the hiding of yourself, then life becomes vibrant again.
Hiding from your history only shackles you to it. Instead, face it and free yourself.
Hide until everybody goes home. Hide until everybody forgets about you. Hide until everybody dies.
Hiding behind titles to create security is insecurity.
Most of us remain strangers to ourselves, hiding who we are, and ask other strangers, hiding who they are, to love us.
When you start hiding things away, that's when the darkness creeps up. Sunlight is the best disinfectant.
It's not about hiding your imperfections on a shoot; it's about embracing them and being unapologetic about them.
Lying, cheating, hiding is the exact opposite of the behavior of a man who's really into you.
Direct experience is the evasion, or hiding place of those devoid of imagination.
Instead of hiding your loneliness, bring it into the light. Honor it. Treat it. Heal it. You'll find that it returns the favor
Extraordinary things are always hiding in places people never think to look.
You can't find peace by hiding from life.
Happiness is the greatest hiding place for despair.
Hiding things is the most foolish thing that annihilates correlation.

Hiding, secrets, and not being able to be yourself is one of the worst things ever for a person. It gives you low self-esteem. You never get to reach that peak in your life. You should always be able to be yourself and be proud of yourself.
Still hiding and afraid to let go. Waiting for you to find me uncover me and show me the way.
Hiding out with the enemy brings only temporary relief.
Some stars like to hide behind the whole idea of acting. But really good actors are not hiding at all. They're not afraid to be disliked, to be a little unsavoury
Because the Beloved wants to know, unseen things become manifest. Hiding is the hidden purpose of creation.
Hiding under the bed doesn't make the worry stop.
Language can be a way of hiding your thoughts and preventing communication.
Hiding our true thoughts and feelings is just one example of how we give our power away.
